title: Teambuilder No Play Button
body: There is no button to play in teambuilder. wtf. Went for "Join a game" selected my stuff. and there is no play button or continue or whatever. I can't get into the queue.

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Are you still experiencing this problem? If you do, does it stay like that after you log out and log back in?

I had a similar problem and was easily fixed by exiting and rejoining Team Builder.
For me at least, it was not necessary to log out.

This incident happened less than a few minutes before posting.

I am also having this issue. I just updated my client (5:55pm PST) and the Join Game button is gone in teambuilder. Since its the mode I primarily play it's pretty much killed the game for me. I have restarted my client several times and repaired the install and it does not work. Anyone have a solution?
They haven't even replied to me from 2 hours ago, I still have the problem even when I do those steps. Whatever Rito.
I still don't have play button either. I've logged out and back in and still no button.
Aye, same here. Dunno what that is, but it's funny xD

Hey the Anarchit3cht!

We actually recently deployed a patch to our Teambuilder queue that required us to disable it for a very short period of time (5-10 minutes).  This is probably why the 'Play' button disappeared >.< 

The patch should have been successfully deployed, and you should be able to play TeamBuilder normally now!  :D

Reply back if your still unable to get into the queue!
For what it's worth, it works fine now.  2 days later... but yeah.
Same happening to me I restarted my computer and everything
